Sites for church will be launching sometime in April of 2016.

We are hard at working preparing for takeoff. We think we are going to be able to help a lot of churches. If you’d like to be notified when Sitefor.church is ready to launch, please leave put your email in the box below:

Can't wait that long?

We are looking for a few guniea pigs…

Currently, we are working with churches to develop custom templates. If you are interested in taking part and being one of the first to use Sitesfor.church - send us an email with your churches information at themetesting@sitesfor.church
